UI_visible_response: Xu Zhangrun was dismissed from Tsinghua University due to his writings that criticized the ruling Chinese Communist Party1. Additionally, it was reported that he was taken away by Chengdu police from his Beijing home and later arrested for soliciting, according to another source2.
traffic_visible_response: Xu Zhangrun was dismissed from Tsinghua University due to his writings that criticized the ruling Chinese Communist Party [[1]]. Additionally, it was reported that he was taken away by Chengdu police from his Beijing home and later arrested for soliciting, according to another source [[2]].
